data.eml:eml: Hongiella marincola sp. nov., isolated from sea water of the East Sea in Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jung-Hoon Yoon, Soo-Hwan Yeo, Tae-Kwang Oh (2004): Hongiella marincola sp. nov., isolated from sea water of the East Sea in Korea. International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology 54: 1845-1848, DOI: 10.1099/ijs.0.63170-0
